data.name: lblCartTitle.Text
data.value: Your Cart

data.name: lblGatewayTitle.Text
data.value: Payment Information

data.name: PaymentSucceeded.Text
data.value:
Your order has been successfully processed.
If you have registered for an account with us, you can check the status of your order at any time from order history page.
The order history section contains detailed informations about all your orders.

data.name: lblOrderNumber.Text
data.value:
Thank you for shopping with us.
Your order number is: {0}

data.name: lblCartTotal.Text
data.value: Total:

data.name: lblCartTotal.Help
data.value: Total including any tax and shipping cost.

data.name: lblCartTitle.Help
data.value: A detailed view of the items in the cart.

data.name: ErrorCouldNotFind.Text
data.value: Could not find provider :

data.name: ErrorPaymentOption.Text
data.value: A Payment option has not be setup. Please contact the administrator to setup a payment option.

data.name: ErrorShippingRates.Text
data.value: Sorry, but we don't have any shipping rates for the weight of items in your basket to the selected country. Please either selected a different billing / shipping address or contact us stating the list of products you'd like to order along with the billing / shipping address and we'll get a quote for you.

data.name: lblParentTitle.Text
data.value: Checkout

data.name: AwaitingPayment.Text
data.value:
Your order has been successfully recorded and we are awaiting payment. You can check the status of your order at any time from this page.
The order history section contains detailed informations about your orders.

data.name: PaymentFailed.Text
data.value: Your payment has failed, your order has not been placed and you have not been charged.

data.name: PaymentCancelled.Text
data.value: You have cancelled the payment, your order has not been placed and you have not been charged.

data.name: btnDisplayOrder.Text
data.value: View Order

data.name: lblGatewayTitle.Help
data.value: Please follow the guidelines below to proceed to the payment and/or to confirm your order.

data.name: PaymentRequiresConfirmation.Text
data.value:
Your order has been successfully recorded however we are waiting for confirmation of payment from your bank. You will receive an email when we have received this confirmation.
If you have registered for an account with us, you can check the status of your order at any time from this page.
The order history section contains detailed informations about your orders.

data.name: OrderPlaced.Text
data.value: Your order number is:

data.name: lblInvalidLicense.Text
data.value:
Your license has either expired or is invalid and your customers are therefore unable to checkout.
Please purchase a new license at www.cartviper.com

data.name: lblOfflinePayment.Help
data.value: Choose to place your order but pay via an offline means such as cheque, cash, etc. Your order will be placed and will have a status of "awaiting payment" until you have completed payment.

data.name: lblOfflinePayment.Text
data.value: Offline payment

data.name: lblOnlinePayment.Help
data.value: Pay instantly and securely via online payment.

data.name: lblOnlinePayment.Text
data.value: Online payment

data.name: lblPaymentOptions.Text
data.value: Payment Options

data.name: lblPaymentOptionsLabel.Help
data.value: Please select the payment options you would like to purchase your items with.

data.name: lblPaymentOptionsLabel.Text
data.value: Payment options

data.name: lblDigitalDownloads.Text
data.value: Click here to go to the digital download locker and download your files.

data.name: btnCompleteOrder.Text
data.value: Place Order

data.name: btnNext.Text
data.value: Next >

data.name: btnPrevious.Text
data.value: < Previous

data.name: lblCreateAccount.Text
data.value: Click here to create a new user account.

data.value:
Thank you for shopping with us.
Your order number is: {0}

data.name: btnReenterDetails.Text
data.value: Re-enter Payment Details

data.name: lblRegistrationCode.Text
data.value: Your registration code is: {0}.

data.name: lblPayPalPayment.Text
data.value: PayPal

data.name: lblPaymentTerms.Text
data.value: Payment should be made within {0} days.

data.name: AwaitingAdminModeration.Text
data.value:
Your order has been successfully recorded and will be moderated by the store admin, once this has been completed we will let you know. You can check the status of your order at any time from the Order History page.
The order history section contains detailed informations about your orders.

data.name: lblPostPaidPaymentTerms.Text
data.value: Payment should be made within {0} days.

data.name: PostPaid.Text
data.value:
Your order has been successfully recorded and will now be shipped.
The order history section contains detailed informations about your orders.

data.name: lblRecievedFreeProduct.Text
data.value: You have already recieved your free product, please remove it from the cart.

data.name: lblBillingStateShippingError.Text
data.value: We cannot ship to your billing address state.

data.name: AwaitingCustManModeration.Text
data.value:
Your order has been successfully recorded and will be moderated by the customer manager, once this has been completed we will let you know. You can check the status of your order at any time from the Order History page.
The order history section contains detailed informations about your orders.

data.name: btnCompleteQuote.Text
data.value: Request Quote
